sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const LandingPage = () => { return (

üîê Welcome to BurnZip

No login. No tracking metadata. No logs. No storage. No footprint. Just trust.

A privacy-first, SaaS framework that leverages modular AI to facilitate encrypted file sharing ‚Äî without compromising user autonomy.

We only generate $ through advertisements, not your data.

Retrieve a file or message
{/* All your existing content below remains unchanged */}

‚úÖ What‚Äôs Stored

Encrypted file blobs, never raw data. Stored short-lived cache. Auto-deletes after expiry (24 hours) or download.

üß† Where It‚Äôs Stored

On third-party infrastructure you control. No persistent disk storage. No database footprint.

Quick Start

Click Get Started to open the uploader. Choose "File" or "Message", enter a 10-character alphanumeric code, then share the ID and code with your recipient. Auto-deletes after expiry (24 hours) or download.

About Ads and Revenue

Ads are the only revenue source; we do not monetise user data. Ads are served via third-party networks and do not change how files are processed or stored.

Save to your home screen

iOS ‚Äî Tap the share icon, select "Add to Homescreen"
Android ‚Äî Tap the three dot menu, select "Add to homescreen"

Security Notes

All encryption is performed client-side before upload. Keep your 10-character code safe; BurnZip cannot recover it for you.

Privacy Policy

1. No Accounts, No Tracking
BurnZip does not require user accounts, logins, or personal identifiers. We do not track, profile, or store user behavior.

2. Client-Side Encryption
All files are encrypted locally before transfer. BurnZip servers never see or store plaintext content.

3. Temporary Metadata
We may temporarily process non-identifiable metadata (e.g., file size, transfer timestamp) to facilitate delivery. This data is deleted automatically.

4. No Cookies or Analytics
BurnZip does not use cookies, trackers, or third-party analytics tools. Your usage is private by design.

5. Third-Party Services
If you choose to integrate with external services (e.g., cloud storage, email), their privacy policies apply. BurnZip does not share data with third parties.

6. Security Practices
We use industry-standard encryption, rate limiting, and tamper detection to protect your data. However, no system is 100% secure ‚Äî use BurnZip at your own discretion.

Terms of Use

1. Acceptance
By using BurnZip, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the service.

2. Use Restrictions
You may not use BurnZip to: Share illegal, harmful, or infringing content; Circumvent security measures; Violate any applicable laws.

3. No Warranty
BurnZip is provided ‚Äúas is.‚Äù We make no guarantees about uptime, performance, or fitness for any purpose.

4. Limitation of Liability
BurnZip is not liable for any damages arising from use, misuse, or inability to access the service.

5. Intellectual Property
All BurnZip branding, code, and infrastructure are privately owned. You may not copy, reverse-engineer, or redistribute without permission.

6. Modifications
We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use of BurnZip after changes constitutes acceptance.

Contact Us

Email: burnzip33@gmail.com

); }; export default LandingPage;
